t.t-value: (line.discount === 0 and line.unit_name === "Units" and line.quantity === 1 and !discount_to_show and !(line.display_discount_policy == "without_discount" && line.price != line.price_lst))

i.class: oe_link_icon fa fa-list oe_icon line-lot-icon oe_green
i.title: Valid product lot

i.class: oe_link_icon fa fa-list oe_icon line-lot-icon oe_red
i.title: Invalid product lot
